General.Name: Anhui Xinlong Electrical Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and services of smart energy-using products for electrical machinery manufacturing industry in China. It provides smart power transmission and distribution equipment and high and low voltage components; cloud computing platform and big data basic platform; application software for government governance; video surveillance front-end products; video surveillance frequency monitoring management platform; IoT data management platform; artificial intelligence sharing capability platform; and storage equipment and intelligent manufacturing products. The company was formerly known as Anhui Xinlong Electrical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2015. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Wuhu, China.
General.Address: No. 118, Jiuhua North Road, Wuhu, China, 241008
